product.Name: GRILLED SHRIMP & ISLAND RICE
product.Description: Seasoned, grilled shrimp skewers on citrus island rice with pineapple. Served with seasonal vegetables.

product.Name: SPICY SHRIMP DIAVOLO
product.Description: A spicy tomato-basil Diavolo sauce with chili-seasoned shrimp tossed with diced vegetables. served over a warm bead of whole wheat penne pasta and topped with shredded Parmesan.

product.Name: ASIAGO PEPPERCORN STEAK
product.Description: Our classic 7 oz. sirloin, grilled and topped with cracked peppercorns and melted Asiago cheese. Served with steamed herb potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

product.Name: GRILLED DIJON CHICKEN & PORTOBELLO'S
product.Description: Marinated chicken breast grilled and topped with roasted red peppers, onions, Portobello mushrooms, Dijon sauce, and aged cheddar cheese. Served with steamed herb potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

product.Name: WONTON TACOS
product.Description: zesty pulled pork or grilled chicken In crispy wonton shells and topped with crunchy Asian slaw with cilantro.

product.Name: PICY QUESO BLANCO
product.Description: Creamy white spicy queso blended with fresh tomatoes, red onion, cilantro and roasted poblanos. Served with warm tortilla chips.

product.Name: BONELESS CHICKEN WINGS
product.Description: Breaded chicken and tossed in classic, hot, or Honey BBQ sauce.

product.Name: SPINACH & ARTICHOKE DIP
product.Description: Creamy spinach, tender artichokes and melted Asiago & Parmesan cheeses served warm with salsa and tortilla chips.

product.Name: BUFFALO CHICKEN WINGS
product.Description: Enjoy any of these traditional, old-school wings tossed in your choice of classic, hot, or Honey BBQ sauce.

product.Name: MOZZARELLA STICKS
product.Description: Served with a tasty marinara sauce, this golden fried favorite is simply delicious.

product.Name: DYNAMITE SHRIMP
product.Description: Plump, succulent shrimp coated in crispy panko bread crumbs and fried, then tossed in a spicy sauce.

product.Name: CHEESEBURGER SLIDERS
product.Description: Juicy burgers and topped with American cheese, grilled onions and signature burger sauce on a toasted bun.

product.Name: STEAK QUESADILLA TOWERS
product.Description: Sirloin steak topped with onions, pico de gallo, peppers, and cheese. Rolled in a grilled tortilla and served with salsa.

product.Name: APPETIZER SAMPLER
product.Description: Must have Mozzarella Sticks, our famous Spinach & Artichoke Dip, delicious Cheese Quesadilla Grande (contains bacon), and Boneless Buffalo Wings.

product.Name: BUFFALO CHICKEN WINGS
product.Description: Tossed in your choice of classic, hot, honey BBQ, Southern BBQ, or sweet & spicy

product.Name: BONELESS CHICKEN WINGS
product.Description: Lightly breaded boneless chicken with your choice of classic, hot, honey BBQ, Southern BBQ, or sweet & spicy sauce.

product.Name: SPINACH & ARTICHOKE DIP
product.Description: A warm crock of creamy spinach, tender artichokes, and melted Asiago and Parmesan cheeses, with salsa and tortilla chips for dipping.

product.Name: CHEESEBURGER SLIDERS
product.Description: Three juicy burgers topped with American cheese, grilled onions and signature burger sauce on toasted mini buns. Served with fries. Add Applewood smoked bacon for an extra $.50

product.Name: CHICKEN QUESADILLA GRANDE
product.Description: Grilled chipotle chicken, melted cheese, crisp bacon, freshly made pico de gallo and a hint of chipotle pepper - all tucked inside two large flour tortillas and ready to wow your taste buds.

product.Name: CHEESE QUESADILLA GRANDE
product.Description: Melted cheese, crisp bacon, freshly made pico de gallo and a hint of chipotle pepper - all tucked inside two large flour tortillas and ready to wow your taste buds.

product.Name: MOZZARELLA STICKS
product.Description: Golden fried and served with a tasty marinara sauce.

product.Name: CRUNCHY ONION RINGS
product.Description: Thick-cut rings coated in bread crumbs and golden fried.

product.Name: DYNAMITE SHRIMP
product.Description: Plump, succulent shrimp coated in crispy panko bread crumbs and fried, then tossed in a spicy sauce.

product.Name: CHILI CHEESE NACHOS
product.Description: Crisp corn tortilla chips covered with spicy chili, queso cheese, sour cream, lettuce, pico de gallo and jalapenos.

product.Name: QUESO BLANCO
product.Description: Creamy white spicy queso blended with fresh tomatoes, red onion, cilantro and roasted poblanos. Served with warm tortilla chips.

product.Name: STEAK QUESADILLA TOWERS
product.Description: Sirloin steak topped with onions, pico de gallo, peppers, and cheese. Rolled in a grilled tortilla and served with salsa.

product.Name: WONTON TACOS
product.Description: Zesty pulled pork stuffed in crispy wonton shells and topped with crunchy Asian slaw with cilantro.

product.Name: CHICKEN WONTON TACOS
product.Description: Zesty grilled chicken is chopped and stuffed in crispy wonton shells and topped with crunchy Asian slaw with cilantro.

product.Name: GRILLED CHICKEN CAESAR SALAD
product.Description: Juicy grilled chicken breast atop a bed of crisp romaine lettuce tossed in our new Garlic Caesar dressing. Topped with challah croutons and shaved Parmesan cheese.

product.Name: GRILLED SHRIMP 'N SPINACH SALAD
product.Description: Tender spinach, crisp bacon, roasted red peppers, red onions, toasted almonds and hot bacon vinaigrette - all topped with succulent shrimp.

product.Name: ORIENTAL CHICKEN SALAD
product.Description: Fresh Asian greens tossed in a tasty Oriental vinaigrette and topped with crispy noodles, toasted almonds and crispy, golden fried chicken tenders.

product.Name: CALIFORNIA SHRIMP SALAD
product.Description: Succulent grilled shrimp, avocado, crispy bacon, black olives, hard-boiled eggs and grape tomatoes all on Bibb lettuce. Tossed with a creamy avocado dressing for a great finish.

product.Name: FRIED CHICKEN SALAD
product.Description: Juicy, crispy chicken, Jack-cheddar cheese, tomatoes and eggs rest on fresh salad greens. Served with Dijon honey mustard dressing.

product.Name: SANTA FE CHICKEN SALAD
product.Description: Grilled marinated chicken breast atop a bed of greens with homemade pico de gallo and Mexi-ranch dressing. Crunchy tortilla strips, cheese, guacamole and sour cream too!

product.Name: ASIAN CRUNCH SALAD
product.Description: Grilled chicken breast served over crunchy salad greens, roasted red peppers, onions, sugar snap peas and refreshing cucumbers. Features our tangy Asian vinaigrette topped with sliced almonds and cilantro.

product.Name: PARADISE CHICKEN SALAD
product.Description: Island blend of pineapple, mandarin oranges, fresh apple chunks, pico de gallo and crisp greens. Topped with slices of blackened grilled chicken and served with cool balsamic vinaigrette.

product.Name: 9 oz. House Sirloin
product.Description: A neighborhood classic in its own right. Our classic steakhouse cut, savory to the last bite.

product.Name: 12 oz. New York Strip
product.Description: Known for its high quality and tremendous flavor, our New York Strip is a juicy USDA Select cut.

product.Name: Bourbon Street Steak
product.Description: A juicy, tender steak jazzed up with Cajun spices and served with sautéed onions & mushrooms and potatoes.

product.Name: Shrimp 'N Parmesan Sirloin
product.Description: It's our surf 'n cheesy turf. Succulent grilled shrimp and rich Italian cheeses atop our juicy 9 oz. House Sirloin.

product.Name: Steak & Portobello's
product.Description: Juicy, flame-grilled 4 oz. sirloin steak topped with sliced, sautéed Portobello mushrooms and a savory brown sauce. Paired with steamed herb potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

product.Name: Asiago Peppercorn Steak
product.Description: Our classic 7 oz. sirloin, grilled and topped with cracked peppercorns and melted Asiago cheese. Served with steamed herb potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

product.Name: Shrimp 'N Parmesan
product.Description: A winning combination.

product.Name: Grilled Onions
product.Description: Grilled to perfection every time

product.Name: Garlic & Mushrooms
product.Description: Sautéed with a kick.

product.Name: APPLEBEE'S RIBLETS
product.Description: A hearty portion of our world-famous Riblets basted with your choice of sauce. Served with fries and cole slaw.

product.Name: Grilled Onions
product.Description: A full rack seasoned and slow-cooked to flavorful and tender perfection with your choice of sauce. With fries and cole slaw these babies are something else.

product.Name: Sizzling Fajitas
product.Description: Your choice of grilled steak, juicy chicken, or a combo of both, on a skillet that sizzles like the Southwest sun. Served with Southwest rice, guacamole, sour cream, pico de gallo, caramelized onions, green peppers and Jack-cheddar cheese. *Steak, Chicken or Combo

product.Name: MARGHERITA CHICKEN
product.Description: A tender grilled chicken breast with a tangy balsamic glaze layered with melted mozzarella and Parmesan, and topped with fresh bruschetta. Served with garlic mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

product.Name: IESTA LIME CHICKEN®
product.Description: A little zest, a little Southwest. Grilled chicken done fiesta-style with a zesty lime sauce. Then we top it with Jack-cheddar and Mexi-ranch, and serve it up with crisp tortilla strips, seasoned rice and fresh pico de gallo.

product.Name: CHICKEN TENDERS PLATTER
product.Description: Tender, juicy, breaded and downright delicious. Honey Dijon mustard makes it even better. Served with fries and cole slaw.

product.Name: GARLIC HERB CHICKEN
product.Description: Seasoned grilled chicken breast served in a garlic herb sauce. Paired with steamed herb potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

product.Name: Grilled Dijon Chicken & Portobello's
product.Description: Marinated chicken breast grilled and topped with roasted red peppers, onions, Portobello mushrooms, Dijon sauce, and aged cheddar cheese. Served with steamed herb potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

product.Name: HAND-BATTERED FISH & CHIPS
product.Description: Cold-water whitefish fillets, hand-dipped in a light batter and golden fried. Served with fries, cole slaw and tartar sauce.

product.Name: GRILLED SHRIMP & ISLAND RICE
product.Description: Seasoned, grilled shrimp skewers on citrus island rice with pineapple. Served with seasonal vegetables.

product.Name: GARLIC HERB SALMON
product.Description: Grilled salmon topped with garlic herb butter and served with almond rice pilaf and seasonal vegetables.

product.Name: CAJUN LIME TILAPIA
product.Description: A grilled Cajun-seasoned tilapia fillet topped with lime juice and black bean & corn salsa. Served on a bed of rice pilaf with a side of seasonal vegetables.

product.Name: DOUBLE CRUNCH SHRIMP
product.Description: A heaping platter of succulent shrimp coated with crispy panko breaded crumbs and fried to perfection. Served with fries, cole slaw and cocktail sauce.

product.Name: PICY SHRIMP DIAVOLO
product.Description: A spicy tomato-basil Diavolo sauce with chili-seasoned shrimp tossed with diced vegetables. Served over a warm bed of whole wheat penne pasta and topped with shredded Parmesan.

product.Name: THREE-CHEESE CHICKEN PENNE
product.Description: Mozzarella, provolone and Parmesan cheeses top off a rich mix of penne pasta, grilled chicken, bruschetta, fresh basil and Alfredo sauce. Served with toasted side bread.

product.Name: CRISPY ORANGE CHICKEN BOWL
product.Description: Breaded chicken covered in a spicy-sweet orange glaze and served over almond rice pilaf and a tasty mix of mushrooms, broccoli, red peppers, sugar snap peas and shredded carrots. Topped with toasted almonds and crispy noodles

product.Name: SHRIMP FETTUCCINI ALFREDO BOWL
product.Description: Plump, juicy shrimp rest on a bed of pasta tossed with fresh broccoli, creamy garlic Alfredo sauce, and shredded Parmesan. Served with toasted side bread.

product.Name: CHICKEN BROCCOLI PASTA ALFREDO BOWL
product.Description: Your choice of juicy grilled or blackened chicken on a warm bed of fettuccini tossed with fresh broccoli and creamy Alfredo sauce. Topped with Parmesan, and served with toasted side bread.

product.Name: SOUTHWEST JALAPENO BURGER
product.Description: This burger is topped with pepper-Jack cheese, candied jalapenos, chipotle mayo, and served on a toasted bun.

product.Name: COWBOY BURGER
product.Description: Topped with crispy onion strings, melted white cheddar cheese, and Applewood smoked bacon. Served on a toasted bun with Southern BBQ sauce, lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles.

product.Name: PHILLY BURGER
product.Description: This burger is piled high with grilled onions, sautéed peppers & mushrooms, and smothered in creamy cheese sauce and aged white cheddar. Served on a tasted hoagie roll.

product.Name: FIRE PIT BACON BURGER
product.Description: Piled with pepper-Jack cheese and slices of real Applewood smoked bacon and served on a toasted bun with smoky chipotle spread, lettuce, tomato, pickles and onions.

product.Name: STEAKHOUSE BURGER W/ A.1.® STEAK SAUCE
product.Description: This burger is topped with cracked peppercorn, our special blend of seasonings and A.1.™ Steak Sauce with crispy fried onion strings, melted Jack cheese and mayo on a toasted bun. Served with lettuce, tomato, and onion.

product.Name: BACON CHEDDAR CHEESEBURGER
product.Description: Cheddar cheese and crispy Applewood smoked bacon crown our thick 'n hearty burger on a toasted bakery bun. Served with lettuce, tomato, pickles and onion.

product.Name: QUESADILLA BURGER
product.Description: A juicy burger with our signature Mexi-ranch sauce with pico de gallo and shredded lettuce. Served in a mouth watering pepper-Jack and cheddar quesadilla (contains bacon).

product.Name: APPLEBEE'S® REUBEN
product.Description: The deli classic with thin-sliced corn beef brisket pilled high and topped with sauerkraut and Russian dressing between slices of melted Swiss cheese on rye with pickles

product.Name: HAND-BATTERED FISH SANDWICH
product.Description: Our hand-battered fish fillet, golden fried and placed on a toasted bakery bun with tartar sauce and lettuce.

product.Name: CALIFORNIA TURKEY CLUB
product.Description: Slices of roasted turkey piled high on toasted bread and topped with Jack cheese, lettuce, sliced tomatoes, Applewood smoked bacon and creamy avocado-ranch.

product.Name: ITALIAN CHICKEN AND PORTOBELLO SANDWICH
product.Description: Grilled, marinated chicken breast topped with sliced Portobello mushrooms, a slice of tomato and chunky marinara sauce. Served on a wheat bun along with fresh fruit.

product.Name: ORIENTAL CHICKEN ROLLUP
product.Description: Golden fried chicken, crisp Asian greens and almonds tossed in our Oriental teriyaki sauce and wrapped in a large flour tortilla.

product.Name: CHICKEN FAJITA ROLLUP
product.Description: Smokey chipotle chicken rolled in a flour tortilla with melted Monterey Jack and cheddar cheeses, shredded lettuce and pico de gallo. Served with Mexi-ranch dipping sauce.

product.Name: KNIFE & FORK GRILLED SIRLOIN SANDWICH
product.Description: A grilled hoagie covered in sizzling slices or juicy grilled sirloin steak, heaps of sautéed onions, sliced tomatoes, lettuce and creamy balsamic mayo topped with aged cheddar cheese. Served with au jus for dipping.

product.Name: KNIFE & FORK CHICKEN CORDON BLEU SANDWICH
product.Description: Grilled chicken topped with shaved Virginia ham, melted Swiss cheese, creamy white cheese sauce and toasted bread crumbs, stacked on a grilled hoagie.

product.Name: FRENCH DIP SLIDERS
product.Description: hree toasted mini buns piled with thinly sliced roast beef with Swiss Cheese. Dip, dunk and drench 'em with au jus on the side.

product.Name: CHEESEBURGER SLIDERS
product.Description: Three juicy burgers topped with American cheese, grilled onions and signature burger sauce on toasted mini buns.

product.Name: BBQ PULLED PORK SLIDERS
product.Description: Three toasted mini buns stuffed with smoked pulled pork tossed in a tangy spicy Southern BBQ sauce and served with pickle

product.Name: TRIPLE CHOCOLATE MELTDOWN®
product.Description: This rich and magnificently moist chocolate cake is topped with both dark and white chocolate. Its fudge-filled center will erupt upon first bite, richly rolling into vanilla ice cream and hot chocolate fudge.

product.Name: MAPLE BUTTER BLONDIE
product.Description: Say hello to the eighth wonder of the world! Your blondie is baked with pecans and topped with a scoop of ice cream and chopped walnuts. Served warm and covered at your table with a rich, sizzling maple butter sauce. And you thought the Pyramids were breathtaking.

product.Name: CHOCOLATE MOUSSE
product.Description: Decadent OREO® chunks, chocolate mousse, hot fudge and whipped cream make this a rich and creamy treat.

product.Name: HOT FUDGE SUNDAE
product.Description: Delicious hot fudge drizzled over vanilla ice cream, topped with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry. Every day should be sundae.

product.Name: STRAWBERRY CHEESECAKE
product.Description: Classic cheesecake, graham cracker crumbs, strawberry sauce and whipped cream make this one to savor.

product.Name: CHOCOLATE CHIP COOKIE SUNDAE
product.Description: A sundae we built for the whole table! We take a huge, warm chocolate chunk cookie, top it with vanilla ice cream, cover it all in hot mocha fudge, OREO® cookie crumbs and add whipped cream. You don't get any more decadent than this.

product.Name: BLUE RIBBON BROWNIE
product.Description: Super moist with hunks of dark chocolate, nuts and hot fudge. Served with two scoops of vanilla ice cream.
